# GitHub Templates

This directory contains templates for GitHub interactions.

## Issue Templates

When creating a new issue, you'll be prompted to choose from:

- **Bug Report** - For reporting bugs or issues
- **Feature Request** - For suggesting new features or enhancements

## Pull Request Template

When creating a pull request, a template will automatically populate with sections to help you provide complete information about your changes.

## Usage

These templates help maintain consistency and ensure all necessary information is provided when contributing to the project.
